moves.name: Rock Smash
moves.effect: Has a chance (50%) of lowering the target’s Defense by 1 stat rank.

moves.name: X Attack
moves.effect: Raises the user’s Attack by 2 stat ranks.

moves.name: Drain Punch
moves.effect: The more damage dealt to the target, the more this move restores the user’s HP.

moves.name: It’s All Down to This!
moves.effect: Charges the user’s move gauge by 2. Raises the user’s Defense by 3 stat ranks.

passives.name: Gritty 5
passives.description: Powers up the user’s moves when it is affected by a status condition.
